help-file.title: SPELLBIND
help-file.content:
Syntax: <spellbind item_name> <spellbind> Lets the alchemist see accumulated power
With this powerful enchantment skill the alchemist can empower an item with mystical energies enhancing the properties of the item. The rate to which the item is improved is based on the level and skill of the alchemist. The first stat of the item will also be raised more than the second stat of the item.
When an item has been enchanted the magical energies make it impossible to repair. Even a failed attempt will render the item unrepairable. There is also a chance that the item will be damaged in the process.
In order to gain the power necessary to spellbind items the alchemist needs to harvest power by killing creatures greater than 10 levels below his own level. The alternative is to gain this power by fragging. With each 0.1 frags the alchemist can spellbind one item.
